phases.title: Foundation
phases.subtitle: Building Your Wellness Base
phases.description: In this phase, you'll establish the core habits and mindset for your wellness journey.

chapters.title: Awakening Your Wellness Path
chapters.subtitle: Setting intentions and establishing daily rhythms
chapters.description: Discover your 'why' and create a foundation for lasting change.

chapters.title: Nourishment Fundamentals
chapters.subtitle: Understanding food as fuel and healing
chapters.description: Learn the basics of nutrition and how to nourish your body properly.

chapters.title: Mindful Eating Rituals
chapters.subtitle: How we eat matters as much as what we eat
chapters.description: Transform your relationship with food through mindful eating practices.

chapters.title: Meal Architecture
chapters.subtitle: Building balanced meals throughout the day
chapters.description: Create a sustainable meal structure that supports your wellness goals.

chapters.title: Gentle Movement Foundations
chapters.subtitle: Movement as self-care, not punishment
chapters.description: Embrace joyful movement that nurtures your body and spirit.

chapters.title: Mindset & Self-Compassion
chapters.subtitle: The inner work that sustains the outer changes
chapters.description: Cultivate a mindset that supports lifelong wellness.

phases.title: Momentum
phases.subtitle: Deepening Your Practice
phases.description: Build on your foundation with advanced strategies and deeper insights into nutrition and lifestyle.

chapters.title: Advanced Nutrition Strategies
chapters.subtitle: Meal prep, portions, and food wisdom
chapters.description: Master meal preparation, portion control, and advanced nutrition concepts for sustained energy.

chapters.title: Sleep & Stress Mastery
chapters.subtitle: The power of rest and stress management
chapters.description: Understand how sleep and stress affect your wellness journey and learn powerful management techniques.

chapters.title: Mindful Awareness & Habits
chapters.subtitle: Building sustainable daily practices
chapters.description: Develop deeper body awareness, mindful eating skills, and understand the psychology of habit formation.

chapters.title: Food Relationships
chapters.subtitle: Healthy cooking and smart choices
chapters.description: Learn healthy cooking methods, make smart food swaps, and understand food's role in your life.

chapters.title: Breaking Patterns
chapters.subtitle: Overcoming obstacles and emotional eating
chapters.description: Address emotional eating, break through plateaus, and develop resilience in your wellness journey.

chapters.title: Movement & Energy
chapters.subtitle: Exercise basics and energy optimization
chapters.description: Build a sustainable exercise routine, understand recovery, and optimize your daily energy patterns.

phases.title: Integration
phases.subtitle: Making Wellness Your Lifestyle
phases.description: Integrate wellness practices deeply into your daily life with advanced strategies and personalization.

chapters.title: Lifestyle Design
chapters.subtitle: Environment and routine optimization
chapters.description: Design your environment and routines to naturally support healthy choices without willpower.

chapters.title: Advanced Eating Strategies
chapters.subtitle: Timing, social eating, and flexibility
chapters.description: Navigate social eating, dining out, and develop flexible approaches that fit your real life.

chapters.title: Metabolic Wisdom
chapters.subtitle: Hormones, nutrients, and optimization
chapters.description: Understand your metabolism, optimize nutrient timing, and work with your body's natural rhythms.

chapters.title: Mental Mastery
chapters.subtitle: Mindset, motivation, and breakthrough thinking
chapters.description: Develop unshakeable motivation, overcome mental barriers, and create lasting mindset changes.

chapters.title: Strength & Movement
chapters.subtitle: Building your physical foundation
chapters.description: Develop strength, improve movement quality, and create an active lifestyle that serves you.

chapters.title: Body Wisdom
chapters.subtitle: Understanding your unique needs
chapters.description: Listen to your body, understand bioindividuality, and personalize your approach for optimal results.

phases.title: Mastery
phases.subtitle: Becoming Your Own Wellness Expert
phases.description: Develop mastery over your wellness journey with advanced knowledge and self-coaching skills.

chapters.title: Resilience & Recovery
chapters.subtitle: Bouncing back stronger from challenges
chapters.description: Build emotional resilience, master recovery strategies, and turn setbacks into comebacks.

chapters.title: Nutritional Intelligence
chapters.subtitle: Advanced food science and application
chapters.description: Deepen your nutritional knowledge with superfoods, supplements, and advanced eating strategies.

chapters.title: Movement Mastery
chapters.subtitle: Advanced fitness and functional movement
chapters.description: Master different movement modalities, understand training principles, and optimize performance.

chapters.title: Energy & Vitality
chapters.subtitle: Optimizing energy throughout your life
chapters.description: Maximize your energy, understand fatigue, and create sustainable vitality practices.

chapters.title: Hormonal Harmony
chapters.subtitle: Understanding and supporting your hormones
chapters.description: Master hormonal health, understand leptin and ghrelin, and support your body's natural rhythms.

chapters.title: Sustainable Systems
chapters.subtitle: Building practices that last a lifetime
chapters.description: Create systems for long-term success, develop problem-solving skills, and plan for maintenance.

phases.title: Excellence
phases.subtitle: Optimizing Your Unique Journey
phases.description: Fine-tune your approach with advanced optimization strategies and personalized protocols.

chapters.title: Metabolic Optimization
chapters.subtitle: Advanced metabolism and body composition
chapters.description: Optimize your metabolism, understand body composition, and fine-tune your nutritional approach.

chapters.title: Performance & Recovery
chapters.subtitle: Peak performance and advanced recovery
chapters.description: Achieve peak physical and mental performance while mastering advanced recovery techniques.

chapters.title: Lifestyle Medicine
chapters.subtitle: Advanced wellness and longevity practices
chapters.description: Integrate lifestyle medicine principles, understand longevity, and optimize for lifelong health.

chapters.title: Environmental Mastery
chapters.subtitle: Creating your optimal wellness environment
chapters.description: Master your physical and social environment to support peak wellness effortlessly.

chapters.title: Advanced Psychology
chapters.subtitle: Mastering the mental game of wellness
chapters.description: Master advanced psychological strategies, overcome any remaining barriers, and develop unshakeable confidence.

chapters.title: Personal Mastery
chapters.subtitle: Becoming your own wellness expert
chapters.description: Achieve personal mastery, develop your unique protocol, and prepare for long-term success.

phases.title: Legacy
phases.subtitle: Living Your Wellness Legacy
phases.description: Integrate wellness as a permanent lifestyle and inspire others while continuing to evolve.

chapters.title: Lifestyle Integration
chapters.subtitle: Wellness as your natural way of life
chapters.description: Fully integrate wellness as your natural lifestyle, moving beyond conscious effort to unconscious competence.

chapters.title: Social Influence
chapters.subtitle: Managing social pressures and influences
chapters.description: Navigate social challenges, set boundaries, and maintain your wellness while influencing others positively.

chapters.title: Continuous Evolution
chapters.subtitle: Adapting and growing throughout life
chapters.description: Develop skills for lifelong adaptation, continuous learning, and evolving your wellness practice.

chapters.title: Leadership & Service
chapters.subtitle: Inspiring wellness in others
chapters.description: Use your transformation to inspire and support others on their wellness journeys.

chapters.title: Wisdom & Reflection
chapters.subtitle: Integrating all you've learned
chapters.description: Reflect on your journey, integrate all your learning, and prepare for continued growth.

chapters.title: Your Wellness Legacy
chapters.subtitle: Celebrating your transformation
chapters.description: Celebrate your complete transformation and commit to your lifelong wellness legacy.
